snippet: Lee Evans, a double Olympic champion from 1968, was barred from coaching for four years for providing a minor in Nigeria with performance-enhancing substances, the country’s federation said.
abstract: Nigerian federation bans former Olympic champion Lee Evans from coaching for four years for providing a minor with performance-enhancing substances.
lead_paragraph: Lee Evans, a double Olympic champion from 1968, was barred from coaching for four years for providing a minor in Nigeria with performance-enhancing substances, the country’s federation said.
